dublin_core.dcvalue: A report and set of case studies on lessons learned from implementing information and communication technology ICT projects for supply chain management in low resource settings based on experience from Dimagi and VillageReach in a variety of engagements in Ghana Tanzania Malawi Uganda and Mozambique Why it helps with planning Examples of the mHealth planning process in action covering technology design and implementation lessons on the topics of program design training and support and scale up
Lessons Learned: ICTs for Supply Chain Management in Low-Resource Settings
